name: Orzo With Tomato Sauce
keywords: basil, orzo, tomato, side dish, summer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons loosely packed fresh basil, finely shredded

recipeInstructions.text: Bring water to boil in a saucepan and add salt to taste. Add orzo and cook, stirring briefly, about 10 minutes or until tender. Do not overcook. Drain.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a saucepan and add garlic. Cook briefly, stirring. Cut tomato into 1/2-inch cubes and add to saucepan. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and pepper flakes. Stir and bring to boil.
Add orzo and basil. Stir to blend, and serve.
